name: Delicious Meatless Baked Ziti
author: trinityman
summary: This elegant, meatless baked ziti is an easy dish and a sure crowd pleaser.
ingredients: ½ (8 ounce) package fresh spinach, chopped
½ (8 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spray a 9x13-inch baking pan with cooking spray
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add ziti and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes
Drain and transfer to a large bowl
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat
Saute spinach and mushrooms in the hot oil until soft, about 5 minutes
Remove from heat and add to ziti
Add ricotta cheese, goat cheese, and 1/2 of the mozzarella cheese to the ziti mixture; combine thoroughly
Mix in spaghetti sauce and transfer to the prepared baking pan
Bake, uncovered, in the preheated oven until bubbly and cheese is melted, about 15 minutes
